title: Inert is not inactive: origin of carbon dioxide electroreduction activity over a carbon current collector-based electrode
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,1531-1539
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE03226D, Paper
Minyang Dai, Wenpeng Ni, Zhouliangzi Zeng, Wei Zhang, Yan Zhang, Shuangyin Wang, Shiguo Zhang
Commercial carbon paper (CP), a classical current collector, does not remain inert when subjected to CO2 electroreduction in a non-aqueous electrolyte.
